metadata.title: USN-5525-1 -- Apache XML Security for Java vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that Apache XML Security for Java incorrectly passed a configuration property when creating specific key elements. This allows an attacker to abuse an XPath Transform to extract sensitive information.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-5525-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  libxml-security-java-doc - 2.0.10-2~18.04.1 libxml-security-java - 2.0.10-2~18.04.1 No subscription required
